comment.author: 21686909@N07
comment._content: People today have no idea that the Harvard-Princeton game was HUGE, maybe the biggest single game of the year in sports.

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content:
Harvard's football team had a perfect season in 1913, ending the series unbeaten and untied. It didn't happen again until 2001. This November 8, 1913, game with Princeton was the only one that the Crimson did not play in their own stadium that year. Harvard won, 3-0. 

A similar scene, previously posted on Flickr:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/4465095404/in/photostream/]

comment.author: 34904489@N07
comment._content:
Wystan:

Thanks for the additional details on this game and for linking to the related image.
